items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO closes today: Should you invest amid 124% GMP surge?
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO has so far garnered a solid response from investors, receiving bids for 63,91,84,780 shares against 1,09,93,000 shares offered, resulting in an oversubscription of 58.14 times

items.title: SME IPO bet, aerial arts: Top personal finance stories of the week
items.description: What risks investors face when they back small and medium enterprises and how aerial art is becoming a popular fitness culture

items.title: Diffusion Engineers IPO Day 2: GMP up 54%; Should you invest or wait?
items.description: The unlisted shares of Diffusion Engineers were commanding a premium of Rs 90, which translates to a GMP of 53.57 per cent against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 168

items.title: Akme Fintrade inks pact with MAS Financial for MSME co-lending; stock up 3%
items.description: The rise in Akme Fintrade share price came after the company said that it has partnered with MAS Financial Services for co-lending in the MSME sector.

items.title: 822 IPOs globally aimed to raise $65bn till August; India tops APAC tally
items.description: Investors, the report suggests, are shifting towards larger, more valuable IPOs at the global level despite the reduced number of listings thus far in 2024
